tool_description: GET  popular new game releases in steam
title: steam game release

api_list.name: Get all popular game releases in Steam
api_list.description: It returns the title, price, release date and image of the games released.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-game-release.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-game-release.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
